room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: Just got out of Ghostly Encounter and it was amazing! My friend's and I all had a great time. Definitely going back! It was well thought out and definitely had some unexpected turns. This place definitely hit the mark.

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: We had an awesome time in the Ghost Encounter Room, thrilling, chilling and clues to make you and shrill lol. My kids loved it, it made us work as a team. And the gentleman that ran it, couldn't have been a better host.

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: The wife and I have done around 30 rooms at multiple locations in Hampton Roads. The attention to detail in ghostly encounter exceeds any other room we have done. We both agreed this is our favorite room that we have done. The staff was very friendly. We immediately booked the explorers club room and will be going back tonight!

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: Such a great time! We did the haunted room and we loved it! Great clues, the room looked great and we had a lot of fun while trying to figure everything out. Definitely going back!! I would highly recommend going!

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: My group did the ghostly encounter, it was fantastic. This is the first time I've ever done an escape room. Not knowing what to expect, it was a great experience. I will be returning to try the other escape rooms available in the near future.

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Encounter" by Escape2Win in Virginia Beach
review: We completed Ghostly Encounter and loved it! Excellent plot and loved the inside joke. Very well put together and a challenge, even for experienced escape room players. The positive reviews are earned! Very highly recommend and we will be back.
